title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General
Interview Descriptions: Very easy, simple, and laid back. Offer a tour of the unit . Asked very vague questions, schooling, background, experience, etc. Don’t stress, be genuine and yourself and will have nothing to worry about.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your background and clinical experience?

title: Unit Secretary Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General
Interview Descriptions: Easygoing, very answerable questions, looking for someone who can complete easy tasks and help answer calls who provides information to the nurses that helps attribute to patient care and work in an amazing environment.

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General (Lafayette, LA) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: You answer questions with your manager and then you do peer and do questions with them. You will get shown the floor if you don’t know where things are. They give you the code of where u need to get your supply at and let you know what the routine is and procedures
Interview Questions: How do you organize yourself when you have multiple test to complete

title: Lab Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General (Lafayette, LA) in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions: met with the manager first she ask some questions like what would you do if you was in the situation second interview meet with two people they asked similar questions not really nothing to be nervous about than they told me they would give the paper to the manager and she would talk to human resources and i would know something by this week, well i’m still waiting to know rather i’m hired or not
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you had to time management

title: Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General (Lafayette, LA)
Interview Descriptions: Quick and to the point. It was a series of two interviews. One with a manager and then with the peers. Similar questions from both stages. Not hard at all.
Interview Questions: How to handle miscommunication in the workplace.

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General (New Orleans, LA) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: Individual interview followed by peer interview. Interviewers were nice and down to earth. Got in touch with me within a week after interview. I got the job but declined. I enjoyed the interview process. Challenging but fair.

title: EKG Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General (Lafayette, LA) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: I received a call nearly a month after submitting an application online to come in for an interview. The interview was two-part; one with the supervisor and then a second peer session.
Interview Questions: What is one vital skill that could assist you in this role?

title: Housekeeping Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General
Interview Descriptions: Informational and very nice, genuine about the well being of each person applying and the interview process. its a very stable environment with great benefits for anyone who works there. Didn't seem biased of race. Very friendly

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: Peer interview is nice. Good questions on what you have done versus what you would do in any particular situation. Also allowed access to peer reviews on the spot and what job was like.
Interview Questions: How have I handled a miscommunication between patient and or family member.

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General (Lafayette, LA)
Interview Descriptions:
Behavioral Interview Questions - 2 tier interview process including leaders and peers   Multiple situational questions used to determine skills 
First interview was with leaders   Second interview was a peer panel
Interview Questions: Name a time you had to deal with a difficult customer.  What was the situation and how did you handle it?

title: Patient Accounts Representative II Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General (Lafayette, LA)
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by the dept. manager. She asked a few questions and asked me to describe my experience in my previous job.  If I had any experience in medical terminology and medicare and medicaid.
Interview Questions: They asked about my experience in medical billing, terminology.  If I knew how to read an insurance eob.

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: Met with the hiring individual for a one to one interview. Once that interview was successful, there was a second interview with future peers to that position. The process seemed to flow well on my end with communication from the hiring individual.
Interview Questions: Tell me a time when you did not agree with a coworker on a decision

title: Director of Operations and Development Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General (Lafayette, LA) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: Submitted and application online via their career portal. I was then interviewed by the hiring manager. Once that was complete, I then had to interview with a group of his peers.
Interview Questions: How did I overcome a situation where I had failed.

title: Patient Account Representative II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Ochsner Lafayette General (Lafayette, LA) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed on 2/20 for the first time, then had a second interview on almost 2 weeks later. I just received an offer as of 3/19. Best bet if you get called for a 2nd interview, just be patient they will call you.
